div.p: In an effort to ease the burden of a two week school shutdown, Tushka School will be providing Grab & Go Meals to our students. We will be providing both breakfast and lunch. All meals can be picked up at the front of the main building, directly inside the Elementary School entrance. Breakfast and Lunch can be picked up between 9:00am and 11:00am. These meals will be served on days Tushka School would have been in session. Please see school calendar.
